item.title: 中国顶级农作物贸易商押宝巴西，削弱美国贸易战的影响
item.description:
中粮集团将于明年在桑托斯开设一个大型港口码头，这是其最新的国际投资项目，旨在与全球最大的食品商竞争。【原文：

Cofco is set to open a massive port terminal in Santos next year, its latest international splurge as it jostles to contend with the world’s biggest food merchants.

】

item.title: 新西兰进口下降有助于缩小年度贸易赤字
item.description: 由于经济疲软抑制了进口需求，新西兰出现了近三年来最小的年度贸易赤字。【原文：New Zealand posted its smallest annual trade deficit in almost three years as a weak economy curbed demand for imports.】

item.title: 东南亚初创企业错失人工智能推动的科技热潮
item.description: 东南亚正迅速成为英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）和微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）等人工智能领军企业的投资热点，这些企业正在向云服务和数据中心投入资金。但该地区的年轻科技公司却未能利用这一热潮。【原文：Southeast Asia is fast emerging as an investment hot spot for AI leaders like Nvidia Corp. and Microsoft Corp., which are plowing money into cloud services and data centers. But the region’s own young tech companies are failing to capitalize on the boom.】

item.title: 唯一赢家是中国安大略省省长向特朗普发出贸易呼吁
item.description: 加拿大最大省级经济体的领导人希望直接向特朗普政府提出反对关税的论点；他提出的理由是，如果北美国家卷入贸易战，中国将是主要受益者。【原文：The leader of Canada’s largest provincial economy wants to take his argument against tariffs directly to the Trump administration — making the case that China would be the main beneficiary if North American countries become engulfed in a trade war.】

item.title: 亚洲股市与华尔街的低迷情绪相呼应：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市将低开高走，此前华尔街又经历了一个低迷的交易日，美联储鹰派中枢调整后，股市和债券走低，美元走强。【原文：Asian stocks are set to open lower after another downbeat day on Wall Street left stocks and bonds lower and the dollar stronger after the Federal Reserve’s hawkish pivot.】

item.title: TPG 就以 80 亿美元收购 Crown Castle 光纤部门进行深入谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，TPG 公司正在就以约 80 亿美元收购铁塔运营商皇冠城堡公司（Crown Castle Inc.【原文：TPG Inc. is in advanced talks to buy tower operator Crown Castle Inc.’s fiber business for about $8 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国经济反弹取决于最富裕城市的命运
item.description:
贫困省份的财政困难正在蔓延到长期以来被认为不会出现经济放缓的富裕地区。这威胁着整个国家的经济。【原文：

Fiscal hardship gripping poorer provinces is spilling into wealthy regions long considered slowdown-proof. That’s threatening the nation’s entire economy.

】

item.title: 成本不足一美分的中国阿司匹林将外国公司拒之门外
item.description: 中国积极推动以价格低廉的国产仿制药取代外国名牌药，这已经对全球制药公司的本地业务造成了影响。现在，在最新公布的获得向中国医院销售常用药品合同的公司名单中，几乎找不到它们的身影。【原文：China’s aggressive drive to replace brand-name foreign drugs with dirt-cheap homegrown generics has already taken a toll on global pharmaceutical companies’ local business. Now they’re almost nowhere to be found on the latest list of companies winning contracts to sell commonly-used drugs to Chinese hospitals.】

item.title: 比特币破纪录反弹后回调加深
item.description: 比特币两天来的跌幅一度扩大至 10%，投机者在这一最大的数字资产创下历史新高后降低了风险。【原文：Bitcoin’s two-day slide extended to as much as 10% at one point with speculators paring back on risk after the largest digital-asset reached an all-time high.】

item.title: 2024 年 ETF 打破了几乎所有能想到的纪录
item.description:
交易所交易基金 行业今年的流量和发行量均创下历史新高。2025 年能否再创新高？【原文：

The exchange-traded fund industry saw record flows and launches this year. Can 2025 top it?

】

item.title: 特朗普新硅谷随行人员名单
item.description:
有些工作比其他工作更真实。【原文：

Some jobs are more real than others. 

】

item.title: 美国钢铁公司因价格 "低迷 "而预测盈利下降
item.description: 美国钢铁公司（United States Steel Corp. ）警告称，由于美国钢材价格持续低迷以及欧洲需求环境疲软，其第四季度盈利将低于预期。【原文：United States Steel Corp. warned its fourth-quarter earnings will be lower than anticipated as steel prices remain depressed in the US and as the demand environment in Europe is weak.】

item.title: 雪佛龙将从能源转运公司路易斯安那终端购买液化天然气
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.）周四发表声明称，该公司已签署了一项为期 20 年的协议，购买 Energy Transfer LP 拟在路易斯安那州设立的查尔斯湖终端出口的液化天然气。【原文：Chevron Corp. has signed a 20-year deal to buy liquefied natural gas exports from Energy Transfer LP’s proposed Lake Charles terminal in Louisiana, according to a statement from Energy Transfer released Thursday.】

item.title: 禽流感爆发，加州 11 月牛奶产量下降 9
item.description: 随着禽流感疫情在美国最大的乳制品州的牛群中迅速蔓延，加州 11 月份的牛奶产量急剧下降。【原文：California’s milk production in November plummeted as a bird flu outbreak spreads rapidly among herds in the country’s biggest dairy state.】

item.title: ChatGPT 从聊天机器人到万物应用程序的两年发展历程
item.description:
OpenAI 正在将其最知名的产品作为通向更新服务和功能的门户。【原文：

OpenAI is using its best-known product as a gateway to newer services and features.

】

item.title: 阿波罗称私人信贷已达到 40 万亿美元的一半
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）表示，私人信贷已经是一个价值 20 万亿美元的市场，未来五年规模可能翻番。【原文：Apollo Global Management said private credit is already a $20 trillion market and may double in size in the next five years.】

item.title: 巴西国会进一步削弱卢拉的削减开支方案
item.description: 巴西下议院在多日内第三次削弱了旨在缓解投资者对该国财政状况恶化的担忧的支出削减方案的关键条款。【原文：For the third time in as many days, Brazil’s lower house weakened key provisions of a spending cut package meant to ease investor fears about the country’s deteriorating fiscal situation.】

item.title: 欧尔班冒着制裁俄罗斯失效的风险要求特朗普提供时间表
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班告诉欧盟领导人，他希望等到盟友唐纳德-特朗普就职后再决定是否延长欧盟对俄罗斯的制裁。【原文：Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban told European Union leaders that he wants to wait until the inauguration of his ally Donald Trump before deciding whether to extend the bloc’s sanctions against Russia, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亚马逊为解决工人安全问题支付 14.5 万美元罚款
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. 将支付 14.5 万美元的罚款，作为与联邦工作场所监管机构达成的和解协议的一部分，该和解协议涉及亚马逊公司在美国的几处仓库和物流设施被指存在不安全状况。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. will pay $145,000 in penalties as part of a settlement with federal workplace regulators regarding allegedly unsafe conditions at several of its US warehouse and logistics facilities.】

item.title: 我最喜爱的谋杀案》新协议对播客市场的启示
item.description:
另外： 未来一年的音乐、播客和有声读物预测

。【原文：

Plus: music, podcasting and audiobook predictions for the year ahead

】

item.title: 法国央行行长呼吁大幅削减赤字
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，新政府仍必须以明年大幅削减赤字为目标，尽管这种努力导致了上届政府的下台。【原文：Bank of France Governor Francois Villeroy de Galhau said a new government must still target significant deficit reduction next year, even though such efforts led to the downfall of the last government.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）面临没钱支付举报人分红的风险
item.description: 美国衍生品市场监管部门在打击被指控的欺诈者和市场操纵者的一年中创下了 171 亿美元的记录，但现在它可能成为自己成功的受害者，因为它希望奖励那些帮助过它的人。【原文：The US derivatives market watchdog had a record $17.1 billion year cracking down on alleged fraudsters and market manipulators but could now become a victim of its own success as it looks to reward those who helped.】

item.title: 美联储调低降息预期后，债券大跌
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）对2025年降息持更为谨慎的态度，令投资者大跌眼镜，并导致全球债券市场溃败，市政债券的跌幅是几周来最大的。【原文：Municipal bonds are plunging the most in weeks after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell took a more cautious view on interest-rate cuts in 2025, stunning investors and leading to a global bond-market rout.】

item.title: 当 TikTok 穷途末路时，这位亿万富翁提出了拯救计划
item.description: 尽管 TikTok 在美国面临着迫在眉睫的禁令，但中国母公司字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd. ）已明确表示，它不打算出售这款流行的视频应用程序。弗兰克-麦考特似乎并没有被吓倒。【原文：Even as TikTok faces a looming ban in the US, Chinese parent company ByteDance Ltd. has made it clear it has no plans to sell the popular video app. Frank McCourt doesn’t seem deterred.】

item.title: 移民推动美国人口实现二十年来最快增长
item.description: 美国人口普查局的数据显示，移民人数的激增是自 2001 年以来美国人口增幅最大的一年。【原文：A surge in immigration drove the largest annual increase to the US population since 2001, according to the Census Bureau.】

item.title: 美联储之后华尔街的下一个考验：6.5 万亿美元的 "三重魔咒
item.description: 随着华尔街交易员逐渐接受美联储放缓降息步伐的计划，周五的美国期权到期日为年末的平静扫清了最后一道障碍。【原文：As Wall Street traders come to grips with the Federal Reserve’s plans to slow the pace of interest-rate cuts, Friday’s US options expiration that has historically stoked turbulence offers a final hurdle to end-of-year calm.】

item.title: 墨西哥连续第四次降息，通胀放缓
item.description: 墨西哥周四连续第四次降息，原因是通胀正在放缓，回到目标水平，经济正在失去动力。【原文：Mexico cut interest rates for a fourth straight meeting Thursday as inflation is slowing back to target and the economy is losing momentum.】

item.title: 英特尔入围可编程芯片 Arm Altera 竞争者名单
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）已经为其 Altera 部门的下一轮竞购筛选了多家收购公司，这家陷入困境的芯片制造商正在为其现已下台的首席执行官启动的竞购进程取得进展。【原文：Intel Corp. has shortlisted a number of buyout firms for the next round of bidding for its Altera unit, according to people familiar with the matter, as the beleaguered chipmaker makes headway on a process started by its now ousted chief executive officer.】

item.title: 巴西央行驳斥对货币政策威力的质疑
item.description: 巴西央行行长表示，他们拥有所有必要的工具来抑制拉丁美洲最大经济体的通胀回升。【原文：Brazil central bankers said they have all the tools needed to tame an inflation pick-up in Latin America’s largest economy that’s driving analysts to question how effective their monetary policy really is.】

item.title: 特朗普的加密项目购买与孙正义有关的代币
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普的加密货币平台 World Liberty Financial 似乎通过 Coinbase Global Inc.【原文：Donald Trump’s crypto platform, World Liberty Financial, appears to have exchanged roughly $10 million of what’s known as wrapped Bitcoin launched through Coinbase Global Inc. for similar tokens associated with project adviser Justin Sun.】
